meanings.definition: A ring-shaped cartilage at the top of the trachea, forming the lower part of the larynx.
meanings.sent1: The cricoid helps protect the trachea.
meanings.sent2: Doctors examined the patient's cricoid during the check-up.
meanings.sent3: The cricoid cartilage decided to throw a party for the trachea.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was as strong as a cricoid, supporting her through the performance.
meanings.sent5: The cricoid, like a guardian, shields the trachea from harm.

meanings.definition: Relating to or located near the cricoid cartilage.
meanings.sent1: The cricoid area was sensitive to touch.
meanings.sent2: The cricoid region was carefully examined by the doctor.
meanings.sent3: The cricoid neighborhood always had the best decorations.
meanings.sent4: His love for her was as close as the cricoid to the trachea.
meanings.sent5: The cricoid proximity to the trachea is crucial for breathing.
